        Concatnames( basetype,member,type,inv,1_,m_ )() : m_val(0), m_insertWasPerformed(false){} \

#define mc_dbms_relationship_1_m_body (  basetype,
member,

inv   ) 
 

Value:

type* basetype::Concatnames( basetype,member,type,inv,1_,m_ )::operator=(type* val) \
        { \
                void* priorVal = m_val; \
                m_val = val; \
                int offset = offsetof(class basetype, member); \
                void* caller = InstanceTracker::findInstance(this, basetype::get_mc_dbms_typespec(), offset); \
                if (val) { \
                        val->inv.insert( caller ); \
                        m_insertWasPerformed = true; \
                } else { \
                        /* If we are removing an element from the collection by assigning */ \
                        /* a value of 0, then remove the "caller" from the other-side of */ \
                        /* this relationship. */ \
                        if (priorVal && m_insertWasPerformed) { \
                                reinterpret_cast<type*>(priorVal)->inv.remove( caller ); \
                        } \
                } \
                return (type*)m_val; \
        }
